about_the_game:
This game is a visual masterpiece. The breathtaking art takes you to mesmerizing worlds filled with uncensored sexual content and interactive H-scenes. Summon your girls, lead them into battle and unlock steamy sex scenes with each of them.


You might be wondering... What does a black hole experiment in the Arctic, a gateway to a different dimension and a space virus have in common? The answer is simple: a bunch of sexy babes!

Team up with the hottest chicks on this side of the universe and fight the evil virus that’s threatening their life. These ladies are totally counting on you!
Other than saving the whole world, you must also make all the waifus fall for you. While charming them, they’ll reward you with their dirty videos, but only if you treat them right. Engage in spicy dialogues with them and watch your fantasies come to life in this epic hentai game.


Kinky monster ladies will spice up your journey. Slime, wolf, gorgon, vampire… anything that you can think of, you’ll find in this galaxy. Duel them, triumph, and once defeated, meet them in the playroom for erotic adventures.



Project QT blends great artwork with thrilling puzzle mechanics and RPG turn-based combat style gameplay for a fun and unique gaming experience.

The adventure is calling - gather your harem and join the mission!

content_descriptors.notes: The Mature content appears from the start, in the tutorial as well as in menus and in events. The characters are depicted in a consensual sexual relationship or positions that are lewd or depict sexual interactions, such as masturbation or various fetishes.

name: Project QT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Additional Notes: Internet required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Internet required

short_description: Project QT is a puzzle RPG filled with hot chicks, amazing battles and the naughtiest rewards. Recruit your team of sexy girls and fight the evil infection that has spread into your world. Humanity needs you, so join the greatest and smuttiest adventure in the multiverse!
supported_languages:
English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
